entry.def: A modem is a device which uses a telephone line to connect computers or computer systems.

example.ex: He sent his work to his publishers by modem.
example.tran: 他通过网络把作品发给了出版商。

means.word_mean: 1. (from a combination of MOdulate and DEModulate) electronic equipment consisting of a device used to connect computers by a telephone line
